resources.string: Reminder Disabled. Send a streak and use the menu below to enable.
Please set when to be reminded using the menu above.

plurals.name: main_interval
plurals.item: Reminder appears an hour after streaks sent. \nSnooze lasts %2$d minutes.
Reminder appears %1$d hours after streaks sent. \nSnooze lasts %2$d minutes.

plurals.name: notif_body_one
plurals.item: Send streaks now. Losing Streak in an hour.
Send streaks now. Losing Streak in %1$d hours.

plurals.name: notif_body_two
plurals.item: You missed a notification! Losing Streak in an hour!
You missed a notification! Losing Streak in %1$d hours!

plurals.name: notif_body_multi
plurals.item: You already missed %1$d notifications! Losing Streak in an hour.
You already missed %1$d notifications! Losing Streak in %2$d hours.

plurals.name: notif_body_delay_unusedfornow
plurals.item: Don\'t forget to send streaks! Losing streaks in an hour.
Don\'t forget to send streaks! Losing streaks in %1$d hours.

resources.string: You are about to lose your streaks!! Send streaks now!
You may have lost your streaks. Send a Snap now or stop the reminder.
How long ago? (as shown on Snapchat)
Too long ago! Send a streak now!

plurals.name: interval_set
plurals.item: You will be reminded for streaks an hour after you send one. Use the Notification Schedule option for details.
You will be reminded for streaks %1$d hours after you send one. Use the Notification Schedule option for details.

resources.string: How long should snooze last (in minutes)?
Your reminder will be deferred for %1$d minutes when you press the Snooze button.
你將設備的語言設定爲台灣或簡體中文了，建議在設定改爲香港中文，否則用語可能比較奇怪。

plurals.name: interval_set_disabled
plurals.item: Reminder not on. Reminder interval is set to one hour.
Reminder not on. Reminder interval is set to %1$d hours.

resources.string: Helps you keep streaks. Only works if you have friends.
The past is in the past.
This app is not sponsored or endorsed by, or affiliated with, Snap Inc.

This application is licensed under the GNU General Public License Version 3 or later. You are free to redistribute and/or modify it under this license. Click to visit my GitHub page for source code and license details.
Sent Streak just now. Time Set.
Manage and customize your notifications in this menu. Try adding a shortcut!
Use this menu after you send your streaks. You can also do it through the notification or a shortcut.

Your device is preventing Streak Alarm from reminding you of streaks accurately. Please go to Settings to disable battery optimization by whitelisting this app. If you have just rebooted or updated this app, please ignore this warning.
Your launcher does not allow shortcuts.
Added Notification Schedule in menu. Please check the new notifications arrangement.
Reminders now work in battery saving mode.

Spanish (Latin America) translation by: Aurea
Korean translation by: Han
Hindi translation by: Radha
Japanese translation by: Nico
Special Thanks to Lokalise for providing a professional translation platform for free.

First notification shows at the specified time.

Second and Third notifications show when halfway and three-quarters between the specified time and lose streaks time respectively.

Last notification shows after 24 hours.

For example, if notification time is set to 12 hours and you sent a streak at midnight, you get a notification at noon, a notification at 6pm, a notification at 9pm, and a final notification after midnight of the next day.
Changed notification behavior. Please check Notification Schedule for details.
23 hours notification time is now supported.
Now fully compatible with screen readers.
(Something like \"hello/welcome, we speak Korean now!\" in Korean). Korean is now supported!
(Something like \"hello/welcome, we speak Spanish now!\" in Spanish). Spanish (Latin America) is now supported!
(Something like \"hello/welcome, we speak Hindi now!\" in Hindi). Hindi is now supported!
日本語がサポートされるようになりました！Japanese is now supported!
